DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate therapeutic efficacy safety two different paracetamol-containing solution postoperative dental pain . They compare placebo ( dummy treatment contains active ingredient ) .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesic Efficacy , Safety Tolerability Two Paracetamol-containing Solutions Post-Surgical Dental Pain
DOC.criteria: ASA I II schedule elective surgical extraction 1 impact mandibular 3rd molar , least 1 must fully partially impacted mandibular 3rd molar require mandibular bone removal . Moderate severe pain within 4 hour completion surgery . Another acute chronic painful physical condition Use analgesic ( within 24 hour ) , sedatives , narcotic drug well microsomal enzyme inducer Inability use understand Visual Analog Scale Verbal Rating Score
